name: Tethered Forever
description:
Overview

This game was created during the GMTK Game Jam 2021. The theme was: Joined Together. 

The two little jelly-os want some of their favourite strawberry ice cream. Help Bumble-Blue and Bumble-Bee to get to the icecream tree!
Bumble-Bee is younger than Bumble-Blue, they will copy exactly what their blue friend does. Help them navigating their way to their beloved cold treat.

How to play

The player controls both characters at the same time. The goal is to reach the icecream tree. Both characters need to reach the tree together to win. 

Controls 

Run >> a, d /arrow keys

Jump >> space / delete

Pause >> esc

Team members and Contributions

Jamie Fuchs: Programming and Unity Implementation

Matthias Niedertscheider: Level Design, Unity Implementation

Beatrice Fuchs: Visual Design and 2D Art, Animations, Sounds, Story
